sys_ui_page.html:
const mplcUtil = new x_376096_mplc.MPLCUtil(); const gitHubSources = mplcUtil.getGitHubSources(); gitHubSources.forEach(src => src.status_icon = 'mpl-status-' + src.status + ' ' + ((src.status == 'ok' || src.status == 'incomplete') ? 'icon-circle-solid' : 'icon-warning-circle bg-warning')); const pageConfig = { globalScopeSelected: gs.getCurrentApplicationId() == 'global', gitHubSources: gitHubSources }; const nowShare = { logo: (function () { return 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'; const appGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_app'); appGr.addQuery('sys_id', '2fe28b4497bf39103c2d3f56f053af4e'); appGr.addNotNullQuery('logo'); appGr.setLimit(1); appGr.query(); if (appGr.next()) { return '/' + appGr.logo + '.iix'; } })(), alias: mplcUtil.CONN_ALIAS.NOW_SHARE, link: 'https://developer.servicenow.com/connect.do#!/share', status: (function () { const status = { value: 'incomplete', message: 'No OAuth Token configured', icon: 'mpl-status-incomplete icon-circle-solid' }; const credentials = new sn_cc.StandardCredentialsProvider().getCredentialByAliasID(mplcUtil.CONN_ALIAS.NOW_SHARE); if (credentials?.getAttribute('api_key')) { status.value = 'ok'; status.message = 'NOW Share connected and valid OAuth Token configured'; status.icon = 'mpl-status-ok icon-circle-solid'; } return status; })() }; const nowStore = { logo: 'https://store.servicenow.com/images/logo/store-logo-new.svg', alias: mplcUtil.CONN_ALIAS.NOW_STORE, link: 'https://store.servicenow.com/sn_appstore_store.do#!/store' };

To install or update an application select one of the following Marketplace Sources

Install and Update apps from the$[SP]NOW Share$[SP](Developer Portal)
NOW Store
Search apps from the$[SP]NOW Store
